item.title: Together in Yellow
item.description:
The 'Together in Yellow' comes with one Together Black watch face and one Yellow strap. The watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match faces and straps of all styles from your Modify collection. The strap is made from a soft and comfortable silicone material and the face is made from a ..

Price: $45.00
